item.title: Arch I3 Fix Open Save File Dialog Too Bix
item.description: Open/Save File dialog not working or too big On a new fresh installation of manjaro i3 windows manager, I had this issue where the open/save file dialog was showing a blank screen.

item.title: Arch I3 Change Default Browser
item.description: The default browser in a new arch linux install is palemoon.
